name: Slack chat.postMessage 最小
description: Slack Web API でメッセージ送信

files.template:
const r = await fetch('https://slack.com/api/chat.postMessage',{ method:'POST', headers:{ 'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':`Bearer ${process.env.SLACK_BOT_TOKEN}` }, body: JSON.stringify({ channel: process.env.SLACK_CHANNEL||'general', text: 'hello' }) });
console.log(await r.json());
